roleset.name: (make) become firm
roleset.note: FIRM-V NOTES: This totally violates my lexicon, to make this a quantifiable verb.Icky icky icky. (from firm.01-v)

role.descr: agent, entity making something else become firm

example.name: most sensical usage
example.text: ...stock prices firmed only modestly in response to the report and then faltered.

example.name: agentive
example.text: It showed some early resilience after central bank support firmed sterling...

example.name: quantifiable
example.text: Pfizer gained 1 7/8 to 67 5/8, Schering-Plough added 2 1/4 to 75 3/4, Eli Lilly rose 1 3/8 to 62 1/8 and Upjohn firmed 3/4 to 38.

roleset.name: secure, steadfast, resilient
roleset.note: FIRM-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8, relation to 'firm-v.01'. (from firm.01-j)
FIRMER-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from firmer.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: The penis is tender when touched , though it is less firm and swollen .

role.descr: agent, entity making something else become firm

example.name: transitive
example.text: He argues that efforts *trace* to firm up prices will be undermined by producers' plans to expand production capacity.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: John-1 always decides *trace*-1 to firm up after the holidays.
